The underground has pure Oilsands ore veins. You may §3centrifuge§r the Dust to get §aHeavy Oil§r§r.


§9§lNote:§r §lThe Oil path is one path towards §9§lEthylene§r§l. The other paths involve Trees and Plants.§r§r
For now, Oil is §doptional§r. But it will become mandatory starting with §5EV§r Age, much later.

Oil can also be refined in the form of §aLight Fuel§r, §aDiesel§r or even §aGasoline§r, which are excellent power options.
If you chose this path, you should use it for both Power and Ethylene. 

Heavy Oil is best used for making §aHeavy Fuel§r for producing §aDiesel§r in combination with another oil type for Light Fuel. Other oil types are also better for producing products such as Ethylene.
